property.name: Attr1
property.value: When the Avalanche is encountered for the first time, each character at this location encounters it. Each character who defeats the barrier is dealt 1 Cold damage; each character who does not is dealt 2 Cold damage. If any character fails to defeat the Avalanche, if is undefeated; put it faceup on the location deck. Characters at this location encounter this card as their exploration, and may not move or be moved until the Avalanche is defeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If defeated, examine the top card of the location deck, then put it on either the top or bottom of the deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, you are dealt 1 Cold damage; move to a random other location, reset your hand, and end your turn.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Each character at this location encounters the Occluding Field. Any character may reveal a boon with the Sihedron trait to evade the barrier; if all characters at the location do so, banish the barrier. Characters who fail to defeat the barrier are dealt 1d4+1 Force damage that may not be reduced. If defeated, shuffle the barrier into a random other open location deck. If there are no other open locations, banish the barrier.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, each character attempts a Dexterity or Acrobatics 13 check. Characters who succeed are dealt 2 Combat damage; characters who fail are dealt 1d6+1 Combat damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, banish either a card of your choice from your hand or the top card of your deck. Place the Haunt next to your character card. For each Haunt next to your character card, the difficulty of your checks is increased by 1. At the end of the scenario, banish all Haunts. When you encounter the Cannibal Haunt, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, each character at this location attempts a Dexterity or Acrobatics 14 check. Characters who succeed are dealt 2 Electricity damage; characters who fail are dealt 1d4+1 Electricity damage. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Karivek is immune to the Cold, Mental, and Poison traits. If the check to defeat does not have the Magic trait, Karivek is undefeated. If undefeated, Karivek does not deal damage; instead, each character at this location buries 1d4-1 cards of her choice from her hand. If defeated, you may immediately attempts to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, Khalib deals 2 Force damage to a random character at this location; each character at this location must then succeed at a Dexterity or Acrobatics 11 check or be dealt 1d4 Fire damage. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Roll 1d6. On a 1, 2, or 3, you may not play spells with the Attack trait. If undefeated, the damage from the Leng Spider is dealt to a random character. Move to that character's location. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Silas is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. Each character at this location encounters Silas Vekker. If any character does not defeat Silas, Silas deals 1d4-1 Poison damage to that character, and is undefeated. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The first time Viorian Dekanti is undefeated this turn, a random character at this location encounters her. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Warden of Runes is immune to the Cold and Electricity traits. Before the encounter, each character at this location must succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 14 check or be dealt 1 Electricity damage. Damage dealt by the Warden of Runes is dealt to each character at this location. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Abominable Snowman is immune to the Cold trait. Add 1 die to checks to defeat the Abominable Snowman with the Fire trait. If undefeated, damage dealt by the Abominable Snowman is increased by 1d4-1.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Frost Worm is immune to the Cold trait. Add 1 die to checks to defeat the Frost Worm with the Fire trait. If defeated, each character at this location attempts a Dexterity or Acrobatics 14 check. Characters who succeed are dealt 1 Cold damage; characters who fail are dealt 1 Combat damage and 1 Cold damage. If undefeated, put the Frost Worm faceup on this location deck; characters may not move or be moved from this location as long as the Frost Worm is faceup on the deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Gamigin is immune to the Fire, Cold, and Poison traits. Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 14 check or you may not play spells with the Attack trait. Other players may not use powers or play cards other than blessings.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Hidden Beast is immune to the Cold, Mental and Poison traits. Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 14 check or you may not play spells with the Attack trait against the Hidden Beast. Before the encounter, each character at this location must succeed at a Combat 22 check or bury 1d4 random cars from his discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Horror Tree is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. Add 1 die to checks to defeat the Horror Tree with the Fire trait. If undefeated, after the encounter, the Horror Tree deals 1d4 Combat damage to each character at this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Hungerer is immune to the Acid and Poison traits. If defeated, attempt a Dexterity or Acrobatics 14 check. If you succeed, the Hungerer deals 1 Acid damage to you; if you fail, the Hungerer deals 1d4 Acid damage to you.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Scarlet Walker is immune to the Acid, Cold, and Poison traits. Add 1 die to checks to defeat the Scarlet Walker with the Electricity trait. Before the encounter, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 12 check or bury 1d4 random cards from your discard pile. Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 12 check or you may not play spells with the Attack trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Shemhazian Demon is immune to the Electricity and Poison traits. Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 14 check or you may not play spells with the Attack trait. If undefeated, reset your hand and end your turn.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Skulking Vampire is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. Before the encounter, succeed at a Wisdom or Perception 16 check or the difficulty to defeat the Skulking Vampire is inscreased by 2, or by 4 if you are the only character at this location. If undefeated, bury 2 random cards from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Warden of Thunder is immune to the Electricity trait. Before the encounter, each character at this location must succeed at a Dexterity or Acrobatics 14 check or be dealt 1d4 Electricity damage. Damage dealt by the Warden of Thunder is dealt to each character at this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Damage dealt by the Warden of Wind is dealt to each character at this location.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Lesser things might have laid these stones, but that those slaves were dead before my coming does not make their city now less my domain." --Ghlorofax, blue dragon

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before the encounter, randomly select an occupied location. Each character at that location must attempt a Dexterity or Acrobatics 14 check. Characters who succeed are dealt 2 Electricity damage; characters who fail are dealt 1d4+1 Electricity damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Karzoug the Claimer may not be evaded, and is immune to the Mental trait. Before attempting to play a spell with the Attack trait, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 15 check or you are dealt 1 Poison damage and you may not play spells with the Attack trait. Before the encounter, each character at this location attempts a Constitution or Fortitude 15 check. Characters who succeed are dealt 2 Poison damage; characters who fail are dealt 1d4+1 Fire damage. After the encounter, Karzoug deals 1 Fire damage to each character without either the Arcane or Divine skill.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Combat

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "You have come far and done much, and for that you should be rewarded. Come, die an honored death before the throne of our master." --Most High Ceoptra, lamia harridan

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 15 check or you may not play spells with the Attack trait. Damage dealt by Most High Ceoptra causes cards to be buried instead of discarded. This damage may not be reduced.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Few doors are without their keepers, and those keepers are rarely well fed." --Excerpt from Preklikin's Book of Cults

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Thing from Beyond Time is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. When The Thing from Beyond Time deals damage, also discard that number of cards from the blessings deck. Effects that reduce damage do not affect the number of cards discarded from the blessings deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Wendigo is immune to the Cold trait. Add 1 die to checks against the Wendigo with the Fire trait. Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 14 check or you may not play spells with the Attack trait. Before the encounter, each character must succeed at a Wisdom 12 check or the difficulty of that character's checks is increased by 2 for the rest of the turn. If undefeated, move to a random location and discard the top card of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Instead of acquiring this card normally, you may attempt a Combat 20 check. If you succeed, acquire this card; if you fail, Ayruzi deals damage to you as if he were a monster. Discard this card to add 1 die to a check, or to explore your location. Discard this card to add 2 dice to a Divine check, or to reduce damage dealt to you by 4.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to explore your current location, adding 2 to checks to defeat banes during this exploration. Then shuffle Gyukak into a random open location deck, or banish Gyukak if there are no open locations.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to examine the bottom 3 cards of a location deck. You may put them back in any order. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 2d8 to a Survival check. Recharge this card to reduce damage dealt to your by 3. Discard this card to explore your current location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Banish this card to shuffle 1d4+1 random cards from your discard pile into your deck. Banish this card to explore your location, adding 2 to any combat checks made during this exploration.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to reduce damage dealt to you by 1, or recharge it to reduce damage dealt to you by 3. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with heavy armors, discard this card instead. If you are proficient with heavy armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Magic Fire

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1d4+1 with the Fire and Magic traits to your combat check. Recharge this card to reduce Combat or Fire damage dealt to you by 3. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with heavy armors, discard the card instead. If you are proficient with heavy armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you played a weapon with the 2-Handed trait on this check, you may not play this card. Bury this card to defeat a barrier with the Lock trait. Reveal this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 2. If you are proficient with light armors, you may play another armor on this check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you played a weapon with the 2-Handed trait on this check, you may not play this card. Recharge this card to reduce damage dealt to you by 2. Bury this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with light armors, discard this card instead. If you are proficient with light armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 2. You may draw up to 3 cards. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with light armors, bury this card instead. If you are proficient with light armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to a check. Discard this card to examine the top 2 cards of the location deck, put them back in any order, and explore your location.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: If the top card of the blessing discard pile matches this card, recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 2 to your Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution check. You may play another item on this check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to move. You automatically succeed at any check required to move. You may not play this card during an encounter.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to reduce Acid, Cold, Electricity, or Fire damage dealt to you by 4.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to reduce damage dealt to you by 2. You may play another item on this check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee die + 5; you may additionally discard this card to add another 2d6. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. If this check is against the villain Karzoug the Claimer, banish this card. Reveal this card to attempt an Intelligence or Charisma 10 check. If you succeed, shuffle 1d6+1 random cards from your discard pile into your deck; if you fail, banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee die + 1d10+2; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d6+8 with the Fire trait. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. Discard this card to attempt an Intelligence or Charisma 8 check. If you succeed, recharge 1d4+1 random cards from your discard pile; if you fail, bury this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 2 to an Arcane or Divine check. You may use another item on this check. When you take Combat damage, reveal this card to shuffle up to 2 cards into your deck instead of discarding them. Reveal this card and discard an item to search your deck and choose an item to add to your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: At the end of your turn, reveal this card to add a random spell with the Arcane trait from the box to your hand; then banish a spell from your hand. Bury this card to add a random spell with the Arcane trait from the box to your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to evade a monster, placing it on the bottom of the deck. If you are exploring, you may immediately explore again. If you do not have the Arcane skill, banish this card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane 16 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Place this card in front of you when a character encounters a bane. Any character who encounters a monster this turn adds 2d6 with the Acid trait to her combat check. Discard this card at the end of this turn, and every other character takes 1 Acid damage

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane 14 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to evade a monster. Search your location deck and choose a boon to add to your hand, then shuffle the location deck. If you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish this card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 14 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Bury this card to shuffle 1d6 random cards from the blessings discard pile into the blessings deck. If you do not have the Divine skill, banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, discard this card to roll your Arcane or Divine die + 3d8 with the Force trait. Each other character at your location is dealt 1 Force damage. If you attempted this check against a monster and did not defeat it, you may evade the monster. If you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish this card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 16 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee die + 1d12+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 2d6 with the Cold or Fire trait. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Dexterity or Ranged die + 1d6+3; you may additionally discard this card to add another 4d4 with the Force trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Dexterity or Ranged die + 1d8+2; you may additionally recharge this card to add another 2d6 with the Cold trait. If you are proficient with weapons, you may discard this card to add 1d4+2 to a combat check at another location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee die + 2d6+2; you may additionally discard this card to add your unmodified Strength die with the Electricity trait. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 4 Barrier 3 Weapon 0 Spell 0 Armor 0 Item 0 Ally 1 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: On checks, treat all die rolls of 1 or 2 as 0.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at a Wisdom or Survival 10 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The altitude of these freezing upper reaches sucks all the oxygen away from these dizzying heights, threatening to suffocate any who would dare scale the tallest of mountains.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On checks, treat all die rolls of 1 or 2 as 0.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 1 Weapon 1 Spell 0 Armor 2 Item 1 Ally 0 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: The difficulty to defeat banes is increased by 5.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at a Strength or Melee 14 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: A ring-shaped maze of access tunnels and gates surrounds a vast arena floor. The bloodthirsty cheers of past specators seem to echo through the chamber, eroding the courage of intruders.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: The difficulty to defeat banes is increased by 5.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 0 Barrier 0 Weapon 2 Spell 3 Armor 1 Item 2 Ally 0 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, bury a card of your choice.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: You may close this location automatically.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The walls of this magical bastion are alive with magic not used on Golarion for more than an age. The arcane pulse quickens as a forgotten power rouses from a slumber measured in centures.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: At the start of your turn, bury a card of your choice.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 6 Barrier 0 Weapon 0 Spell 0 Armor 0 Item 0 Ally 0 Blessing 3

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Put 12 markers on this card. When a character ends a turn here, remove 1d4 markers. When the last marker is removed, summon and encounter the villain The Thing from Beyond Time.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at an Intelligence, Knowledge, or Arcane 14 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Strange cables, frameworks of unidentifiable metals, and strange lights captured in transparent cylinders combine into a device of utterly alien purpose. A rent in the fabric of reality itself seems to shimmer within the ring that forms the center of this enigmatic device. At its core, something pulses within the veils of energy as if trying to break through.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The restoration of Thassilon has begun. Within his fortress-city of Xin-Shalast, Karzoug, Runelord of Greed, stirs from his ages-long slumber. Those who survive climbing the dizzying Kodar Mountains and exploring the ruined city of Xin-Shalast must still face Karzoug's most nefarious guardians and fight their way to the Eye of Avarice. Within that magical refuge they'll finally face Karzoug himself in a battle to determine the fate of all Varisia. Will the heroes survive, or will the runelords rise once more?

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Cabin in the Snow The Road through Xin-Shalast Scaling Mhar Massif Assault on the Pinnacle Into the Eye

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Each character gains a card feat.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: High atop the mountain of Mhar Massif rises the Pinnacle of Avarice, the citadel of Runelord Karzoug. But it is far from empty. Within, the runelord's servants have reawakened, bringing the treasures of Thassilon to bear against any who would invade their ancient sanctuary?

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Leng Device Runewell Throne Room Thassilonian Dungeon Mountain Peak Prison Guard Tower Temple

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you defeat a bane, pick a type of boon other than loot and put a random card of that type from the box facedown under this card.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Most High Ceoptra

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Khalib Viorian Dekanti Warden of Runes

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Loot: Chellan, Sword of Greed and all cards under this scenario card.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Exploring Runeforge revealed the path to one of the legendary and ancient capitals of the Thassilonian Empire--the mountain city of Xin-Shalast. But reaching the mythical city won't be easy, as the hungry spirits of the lethal peaks don't tolerate trespassers!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Mountain Peak Treacherous Cave Village House Woods Wooden Bridge Temple Desecrated Vault Throne Room

property.name: Attr1
property.value: After you encounter a Haunt, place it in front of your character for the rest of the scenario. When the Wendigo is encountered, anyone may banish any number of Haunts from in front of his character. Until the end of the turn, the difficulty of any check to defeat the Wendigo is decreased by 2 for each banished Haunt.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Karivek Vekker Silas Vekker Cannibal Haunts

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a power feat.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The Eye of Avarice, an other-dimensional sanctuary secreted within the Pinnacle of Avarice, lies exposed. Within rests the final guardians of Xin-Shalast, a runewell that powers the arcane dimension, and the reawakened tyrand himself: Karzoug, Runelord of Greed!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: No blessings deck is used. Shuffle Karzoug and 1 henchman per character into the Runewell deck. Defeating a henchman or villain does not close the Runewell unless the deck is empty. Karzoug may not be defeated unless the deck is empty.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Karzoug the Claimer

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Enslaved Blue Dragon Warden of Runes

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Loot: Robes of Xin-Shalast, Karzoug's Burning Glaive, Sihedron Tome

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The palace of Xin-Shalast's runelord master ruses from the sculpted cliffs of Mhar Massif, one of the deadliest peaks in all Varisia. Dare the thin air and the deadly things that skitter upon its stones to reach the treasures hidden amid the dizzying heights!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Death Zone Death Zone Death Zone Death Zone Death Zone Death Zone

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Place the Death Zone in the center of the table. Using the deck list from the Death Zone, make a number of duplicate Death Zone stacks equal to the number of characters. Each closed stack increases the difficulty of checks to close open stacks by 2. To win the scenario, close all of the stacks.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Leng Spiders

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a skill feat.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Xin-Shalast, capital of the greed-dominated Thassilonian nation of Shalast and the source of the ancient magic that has plagued Varisia for so long, has been rediscovered! But it is far from empty. Scour the ruins of their titanic guardians including the elusive blue dragon menace, Ghlorofaex!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Mountain Peak Heptaric Locus Town Square City Gate Temple Garrison Guard Tower Academy

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Place the villain Ghlorofaex faceup next to this card. When you defeat a henchman, place him under Ghlorofaex. When you attempt to close a location, Ghlorofaex uses his power. When the number of henchmen under Ghlorofaex is at least equal to the number of characters, the next time you encounter a henchman, banish that henchman, add Ghlorofaex to the location, and encounter him.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Warden of Runes

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character chooses a type of boon other than loot and draws a random non-Basic, non-Elite card of that type from the box.
